mapper.sql: SELECT admin.id AS id, admin.`username`, admin.`name`, admin.`gender`, admin.`phone_number`, admin.`email`, admin.`remark`, admin.`create_time`, role.`id` AS role_id, role.`name` AS role_name FROM ${@com.pegasus.kafka.common.constant.Constants@DATABASE_NAME}.`sys_admin` admin LEFT OUTER JOIN ${@com.pegasus.kafka.common.constant.Constants@DATABASE_NAME}.`sys_role` role ON admin.`role_id`= role.`id`
